import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import MarkAttendence from "./MarkAttendence"; import axios from "axios" const AddStudenthtmlForm = () => { const [Name, setName] = useState(""); const [course, setCourse] = useState(""); const [semester, setSemester] = useState(""); const [rollNo, setRollNo] = useState(""); const [batch, setBatch] = useState(""); const [student,setStudent] = useState({}); const submitValue = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const studentObj = { Name: Name, Course: course, RollNo: rollNo, Batch: batch, Semester: semester }; setStudent(studentObj) axios.post("localhost:8000/", studentObj) .then((res) => { console.log(res); }) .catch((e) => { console.log(e); }); }; return ( <>

setName(e.target.value)} />
setRollNo(e.target.value)} />
